Class ThatsLife

java.lang.Object
ThatsLife
public class ThatsLife
extends java.lang.Object
That's Life (inspired by the board game "The Game of Life") This class is the master That's Life game class. It holds all the life cycles of all the classes.

  • Field Details

    • args

      public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> args
      This static attribute contains some game arguments that some of the game classes would take. An example of such argument is the norng argument, which inhibits the use of RNG when dealing with player spin. As such, the player will enter a number rather than spin for a random one.

    • kb

      public static final java.util.Scanner kb
      Since it is recommended by the Java community to use a single scanner for all user inputs, this is it. Even the Main Driver Class has to use this scanner. This is because there are instances where when multiple scanners are being used and being closed, the InputStream in Java closes, hence, not allowing other scanners to function properly. This scanner should be closed before the driver class closes.

  • Constructor Details

    • ThatsLife

      public ThatsLife​(int numPlayers)
      A game is instantiated given the number of players for the game. The constructor initializes all the players, the map, and all card decks.
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - An integer value of the number of players for the new instance of the game.

  • Method Details

    • getMap

      public Map getMap()
      This method returns the map instance for this instance of the game.
      Returns:
      map : Map

    • getTurn

      public int getTurn()
      This method returns the value for which player's turn it currently is.
      Returns:
      turn : int

    • getPlayerString

      public java.lang.String getPlayerString​(int index)
      This method returns a player's information, based on the Player class' toString method.
      Parameters:
      index - - The index of the player in the player array. Must be 0 - nPlayers - 1.
      Returns:
      playerData : String

    • startTurn

      public int startTurn()
      This method initiates a player's turn. It returns the player index for the next turn.
      Returns:
      nextTurn : int

    • isOngoing

      public boolean isOngoing()
      This method checks if the game is still ongoing by checking the final space of the map if it holds all the players. It returns a boolean value that represents the game state.
      Returns:
      isOnGoing : boolean

    • declareRanking

      public java.lang.String declareRanking()
      This method returns the single String that contains the final ranking for all players after the game. This method should only be called once the isOnGoing() method return false.
      Returns:
      rank : String

    • addGameArgs

      public static void addGameArgs​(java.lang.String arg)
      This method adds arguments to the game's static arguments class variable. These arguments are used to inhibit/customize certain game behaviors.
      Parameters:
      arg - : String - argument to add.

    • rollNumber

      public static int rollNumber()
      This is the main random number generator for the game. It "spins" and generates a number from [1,10].
      Returns:
      An integer corresponding to the randomly generated number.

    • getDeck

      public static Deck getDeck​(int index)
      This method returns the instance of the card deck given the index. 0 - Career Deck 1 - Salary Deck 2 - Blue Deck 3 - Action Deck 4 - House Deck
      Parameters:
      index - : int - index of the deck
      Returns:
      deck : Deck
